FeedTrackedChange.name: FeedTrackedChange
FeedTrackedChange.description: Represents an individual field change or set of field changes. A FeedTrackedChange is a child object of a record feed, such as AccountFeed.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO currency code for the field, if FieldName is a currency field.

FeedItemId.description: ID of the parent feed that tracks the field change.

FieldName.description: The name of the field that was changed. Note This field also tracks other events that are not related to an individual field for a parent feed. These events occur as the parent record advances through its pipeline. For example, a value of leadConverted indicates that a lead has been converted to an opportunity. For a full list of values, see Tracking of Special Events.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldCurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO currency code for the OldValue field, if FieldName is a currency field.

OldValue.description: The last value of the field before it was changed.
